# Introduction to QGIS

Welcome to the Introduction to QGIS course by [Gispo Ltd.](https://gispo.fi)!

These course materials are designed to be used during the two-day Introduction to QGIS course.

Todo: add some more materials here

## About

When working through the material, try to follow along the exercises as well as you can.
Even if you cannot complete an exercise, you learn much more by at least trying.

The materials contain notes and hints that help with completing the exercises.
These are placed in special boxes.
Hints look like this:

:::{.hint-box}
**Hint:** these boxes contain useful tips for completing exercises.
:::

While notes look like this:

:::{.note-box}
**Note:** these boxes contain various things that should to keep in mind and consider.
:::
